players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Shocked Diana is gone. We need to be careful and figure this out together. Who has any thoughts?"
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. We must vote her out today."
Bob: "Alice is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. We must vote her out to win."
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafia. Bob is trying to save his partner by framing me."
